title: Modules and Packages
overview: Learn how to organize Python programs into reusable modules and packages. This helps manage large codebases and promotes code reuse.
topics: Practical uses of modules and packages
practice: Create a module with add and subtract functions.
Create a package named utilities containing multiple modules.
Import a function using 'from module import function'.
summary: Modules and packages allow you to split Python code into separate files and directories for better organization and reuse. Using custom modules and packages makes it easier to maintain and scale your programs.
